title: Level 2: Yaa shapes
description: Practice the /y/ sound in isolated, initial, medial, and final forms.
objective: Help children spot the letter Yaa in every position without using full words.

steps.prompt: Hear the /y/ sound. Tap the isolated shape.
steps.hint: Find the two dots below the curve.

steps.prompt: Hear /y/ at the start. Tap its initial shape.
steps.hint: Look for the forward curve with two dots.
No connectors appear on either side.
It connects on both sides with two dots below.

steps.prompt: Match the sound to the final /y/ shape.
steps.hint: The tail hangs with two dots underneath.
Pick the starting curve with two dots.
The isolated form keeps two dots below.

steps.prompt: Match the audio to the medial /y/ shape.
steps.hint: It connects on both sides with two dots underneath.
Choose the form that finishes with two dots.

steps.prompt: Which option shows /y/ connecting on both sides?
steps.hint: It links on both sides while keeping two dots.

steps.prompt: Spot /y/ with two dots in final form.
steps.hint: The final form ends with a tail and two dots.

steps.prompt: Great work practicing the /y/ letter shapes.
